column4: hey guys.. for some reason when I installed gnash my youtube started screwing up..
is there a way to download an official deb file for flash retail ? not the generic crap ?
yes, the package is called flashplugin-nonfree
yup, thats a problem thats yet to be fixed. i had that problem as well, ill find the solution... wherever i put it.
flash isnt open source, so you dont have to compile it.
there is an easy solution to your problem, i just have to remember what it was.
here it is: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=634404 ("Schalken" is me BTW)
there was a working package posted by "daradib
oh, dont bother using Adobe's stuff directly unless you REALLY cant find DEB (which i just pointed you to for the second time)
use the right one for your archietecture. are you on 64bit, 32bit or PPC?
i am on 64bit as well and thats the deb i used.
